plot: The wealthy Mr. Rich likes to cruise the seedier areas of Manhattan in his limousine, finding those who are willing to do whatever he wants them to do for a price--as long as he is able to watch.
title: The Ultimate Voyeur
plot_es: The wealthy Mr. Rich likes to cruise the seedier areas of Manhattan in his limousine, finding those who are willing to do whatever he wants them to do for a price--as long as he is able to watch.
plot_en: The wealthy Mr. Rich likes to cruise the seedier areas of Manhattan in his limousine, finding those who are willing to do whatever he wants them to do for a price--as long as he is able to watch.
